name: part_014
file: tmp_【#つながるホロライブDAY1】hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish【チラ見せ】 [zkXvWvTX_BE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_014.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Happiness World' by Shirakami Fubuki and Houshou Marine.
MC section where the two performers interact with the audience and each other.

subtitles.original: あーめでたい 眠い ずっとベッドでたくない
subtitles.english: Ah, it's great but I'm sleepy. I don't want to get out of bed.

subtitles.original: 寝坊じゃない 今日は休みなんだ ついでにバイバイ
subtitles.english: I'm not oversleeping, it's my day off! So, bye-bye.

subtitles.original: そういうときはそう 何かやりたいことやってみよう
subtitles.english: At times like that, let's try doing something you want to do.

subtitles.original: 消化してこう 君の内に秘める欲望
subtitles.english: Let's unleash the desires hidden inside you.

subtitles.original: 甘い切り（甘い切り）
subtitles.english: Sweet mist (Sweet mist)

subtitles.original: 声を出してシチュワーイェイ！
subtitles.english: Raise your voice, sit-chu-wa-yay!

subtitles.original: 恥ずかしい気持ちとは 今すぐにバイバイさ
subtitles.english: Say goodbye to feeling embarrassed right now.

subtitles.original: エンジン全開 弾けようぜ
subtitles.english: Full engine power, let's let loose!

subtitles.original: 1, 2, 3... Happiness World!
subtitles.english: 1, 2, 3... Happiness World!

subtitles.original: Happiness World
subtitles.english: Happiness World

subtitles.original: 進め濃い my days 立ち止まらずに
subtitles.english: Move forward in these intense days without stopping.

subtitles.original: 未来へのドア 叩けカンカン
subtitles.english: Knock on the door to the future, knock-knock.

subtitles.original: 1秒も無駄にはできないよ
subtitles.english: Can't afford to waste even a single second.

subtitles.original: まだ曝け出せ
subtitles.english: Show more of yourself.

subtitles.original: いっそパンピー ハイテンションで
subtitles.english: Just go with high tension like a normal person.

subtitles.original: 帆を上げろ お宝出航！
subtitles.english: Raise the sails, treasures away!

subtitles.original: 後悔したくない その思いが
subtitles.english: The feeling of not wanting any regrets...

subtitles.original: 追い風になる
subtitles.english: ...will become the wind at your back.

subtitles.original: あまたな思い出して
subtitles.english: Recall the countless memories.

subtitles.original: 私たちがいるから 最高にハッピーな運命を Yeah!
subtitles.english: Since we're here, let's have the happiest destiny! Yeah!

subtitles.original: 皆さん！次は早口ですが
subtitles.english: Everyone! The next part is fast-paced!

subtitles.original: マリンちゃん噛まないでね！
subtitles.english: Marine-chan, don't trip over your words!

subtitles.original: 船長は噛みませんよ！
subtitles.english: I won't trip over them!

subtitles.original: フブキちゃんこそ大丈夫ですか？
subtitles.english: Are you sure you're okay, Fubuki-chan?

subtitles.original: 大丈夫！任せなさい！
subtitles.english: I'm fine! Leave it to me!

subtitles.original: 年がら年中 一生 time
subtitles.english: All year round, for a lifetime of showtime.

subtitles.original: 来るもの拒まず it's all right
subtitles.english: Everyone's welcome, it's all right.

subtitles.original: 両手を上げましょう 万歳
subtitles.english: Let's raise our hands, banzai!

subtitles.original: まだまだこれでも物足りない
subtitles.english: This still isn't enough!

subtitles.original: 古今東西の老若男女
subtitles.english: Young and old, from all times and places.

subtitles.original: 楽しいことが一番でしょ
subtitles.english: Having fun is what matters most, right?

subtitles.original: 少しだけ羽を外してみましょう
subtitles.english: Let's let loose just a little bit.

subtitles.original: ようこそワンダラ
subtitles.english: Welcome to Wonderland.

subtitles.original: 今日も一歩一歩踏み出せばきっと
subtitles.english: Take it step by step today, and surely...

subtitles.original: 人生の経験値ゲット
subtitles.english: ...you'll gain life experience.

subtitles.original: ふとした何気ないことだって
subtitles.english: Even the small, trivial things...

subtitles.original: 多分笑えるさ
subtitles.english: ...can probably make you laugh.

subtitles.original: 今だ！今だけがチャンスだ
subtitles.english: Now! This is the only chance.

subtitles.original: 夢を掴もう
subtitles.english: Let's grab our dreams.

subtitles.original: 明日から紙吹雪シルバー
subtitles.english: From tomorrow, silver confetti.

subtitles.original: 想像したことない出来事がきっと待ってるさ
subtitles.english: Unimaginable events are surely waiting for you.

subtitles.original: 待ってるさ
subtitles.english: They're waiting.

subtitles.original: シングアソングで心躍らせ
subtitles.english: Sing a song and make your heart dance.

subtitles.original: ポジティブにさあ面舵いっぱい
subtitles.english: Stay positive, now hard to starboard!

subtitles.original: 気持ち晴れ渡るその瞬間
subtitles.english: The moment your feelings clear up...

subtitles.original: 全速前進！
subtitles.english: ...full speed ahead!

subtitles.original: 無駄じゃない 私たちと一緒に
subtitles.english: It's not in vain, together with us.

subtitles.original: 最高にハッピーな人生を Yeah!
subtitles.english: Let's live the happiest life! Yeah!

subtitles.original: せーの！みんなでハッピーな人生を Yeah!
subtitles.english: One, two! Everyone, let's live a happy life! Yeah!

subtitles.original: はい！ということで！改めてまして皆さん！
subtitles.english: Yes! And so, once again, hello everyone!

subtitles.original: こんしょー！マリンです！
subtitles.english: Ahoy! I'm Marine!

subtitles.original: えっ
subtitles.english: Eh?

subtitles.original: 君たち！こんこんきつね！白上フブキでしょう！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Kon-kon kitsune! It's Shirakami Fubuki!

subtitles.original: サイリウム消して！サイリウム消して！
subtitles.english: Turn off your lightsticks! Turn them off!

subtitles.original: やばいやばいやばい！見知らぬ見知らぬ！
subtitles.english: Oh no, oh no! We're strangers now!

subtitles.original: マリン！暗い！
subtitles.english: Marine! It's dark!

subtitles.original: 白上暗い！
subtitles.english: Shirakami, it's dark!

subtitles.original: 遅いんだよ馬鹿野郎！
subtitles.english: You're too slow, you idiots!

subtitles.original: はいはいはいはい！皆さんサイリウム点けてください！
subtitles.english: Okay, okay! Everyone, please turn your lightsticks back on!

subtitles.original: はい点けてください！
subtitles.english: Yes, please turn them on!

subtitles.original: ということで改めてまして、白上フブキと宝鐘マリンです！
subtitles.english: Once again, we are Shirakami Fubuki and Houshou Marine!

subtitles.original: マリフブ！
subtitles.english: Mari-Fubu!

subtitles.original: 何そのポーズ！
subtitles.english: What's with that pose?

subtitles.original: ちょっと対にしてみた対に！
subtitles.english: I tried to make it symmetrical!

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、やっぱバランスを見て。向きみたいな。
subtitles.english: Well, I was looking at the balance. Like our orientation.

subtitles.original: 臨機応変！キュートなポーズ！いや可愛くない？
subtitles.english: Adaptable! A cute pose! Isn't it cute?

subtitles.original: 二人でHappiness Worldをお届けしました！
subtitles.english: The two of us performed 'Happiness World'!

subtitles.original: いやーなんかこの曲うちの知ってますよね？
subtitles.english: Man, you guys know this song, right?

subtitles.original: いや知ってますよね、知らない人なんていないですよね？潜りだぞ知らない人って！
subtitles.english: You know it, right? Everyone knows it! If you don't, you're a fake fan!

subtitles.original: この曲ラジオで発表されて、我々もずっとラジオやってますからね。絆よ絆！
subtitles.english: This song was announced on our radio show. We've been doing it for so long. It's our bond!

subtitles.original: そう、道理道理！
subtitles.english: Exactly, exactly!

subtitles.original: ねー、ビジネスフレンドじゃない？
subtitles.english: Hey, we're not just business friends, are we?

subtitles.original: うん、もちろん！
subtitles.english: Of course not!

subtitles.original: えっ、本当に？ちょっと間が空いちゃった。まずい！
subtitles.english: Wait, really? There was a bit of a pause there. Oh no!

subtitles.original: やめてくださいもうちょっと！
subtitles.english: Stop it already!

subtitles.original: まぁでもね、フブちゃん！ついに！ホロフェス！始まりました！
subtitles.english: But anyway, Fubu-chan! Finally! Holofes has begun!

subtitles.original: 1日目！うー！拍手拍手！
subtitles.english: Day 1! Woo! Round of applause!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Yay! Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: いやー本当にね。色々練習してきたけどさ、ダンスどうだった？
subtitles.english: Seriously. We practiced so much. How was the dancing?

subtitles.original: いやさっきHappiness Worldさ、白上若干...
subtitles.english: During 'Happiness World' just now, Shirakami was a little...
